page.title: 11WIDENING THE M5, BROMSGROVE
page.content: I live about 60 metres away from where the M5 motorway crosses the Kidderminster road. They are widening the M5. It will go on until 1987. It is being done by the Department of Transport. They brought bulldozers and diggers, then started ripping up all the hedging and fencing on the bank. Then they burnt it all. It took two weeks. The black smoke was terrible and we couldn't open our windows. Dust comes out of the trackways when the lorries go over them. They sweep the road every day because big lumps of soil drop off the lorries. They have been digging ditches and putting piping in. Through the day, when they are working, it is very noisy at my house. All the way from my house to the motorway bridge there are cones and traffic lights, causing long traffic jams.
